snippet.title: Psychroma - Exclusive Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description: Dive into the unsettling world of Psychroma in this latest trailer. Uncover a captivating narrative in this psychological horror side-scroller where you must piece together cybernetic memories of a certain house and its inhabitants. Psychroma will be available on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.
